title: Cotton Pest Classification Expert Course: Deep Learning-Based Image Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Biology Knowledge and Image Data Processing Experience
context.additional_context: Practical education centered on hands-on training for students aspiring to careers in agricultural and life sciences

learning_goals: Learners can identify morphological characteristics of 10 major cotton pests with 95% accuracy

Within one week, learners will fine-tune the ResNet34 model to implement a web-based classification system that achieves over 85% accuracy on the CIFAR-100 pest image dataset (10 classes) and submit prediction results for 20 test images.
Preparation of pest distribution pattern analysis reports using real field data
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
